ing: 1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
des: "This mixed drink has many ingredients, but is the smoothest and best mixed drink you will ever try."
ins: Combine the whisky, tequila, 151 proof rum, vodka, raspberry liqueur, coconut rum, triple sec, sweet and sour mix, lemon-lime soda, pineapple juice and ice in a cocktail shaker; shake. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with dash of grenadine syrup.
